content:
Demultiplex - NGS Sample Demultiplexing

Comprehensive bioinformatics pipeline for demultiplexing raw sequencing data from multiple next-generation sequencing platforms. Converts multiplexed raw sequencing files into sample-specific FASTQ files with comprehensive quality control and validation.

What is Demultiplexing?

Demultiplexing is the crucial first step in NGS data processing that separates pooled sequencing reads into individual sample files based on index sequences, enabling downstream analysis of each sample independently.

Key Features

  • Multi-Platform Support: Illumina, Element, Singular, 10x
  • Multiple Demuxers: bcl2fastq, bclconvert, bases2fastq, sgdemux, mkfastq
  • Quality Control: Comprehensive QC with Falco and checkqc
  • Adapter Trimming: Optional fastp processing
  • MD5 Validation: File integrity checking
  • Containerized: Reproducible across platforms

Supported Platforms

  1. Illumina: bcl2fastq or bclconvert for BCL conversion
  2. Element Biosciences: bases2fastq for Element sequencers
  3. Singular Genomics: sgdemux for Singular platforms
  4. 10x Genomics: mkfastq for single-cell applications
  5. Custom FASTQ: fqtk for non-standard formats

Pipeline Workflow

  1. Sample Sheet Validation: Verify input format and indices
  2. Demultiplexing: Platform-specific conversion to FASTQ
  3. Quality Control: Optional checkqc assessment
  4. Adapter Trimming: fastp for quality and adapter removal
  5. Raw Read QC: Falco quality assessment
  6. MD5 Checksums: Generate file integrity hashes
  7. MultiQC Report: Comprehensive summary of all metrics

Scientific Applications

  • Genomics Workflows: Prepare data for any analysis
  • Core Facilities: Standardized data delivery
  • Quality Assessment: Validate sequencing runs
  • Data Management: Organized sample separation

Quality Control Features

  • Index Quality: Assess demultiplexing confidence
  • Read Quality: Per-base and per-read metrics
  • Adapter Detection: Identify contamination
  • Yield Metrics: Quantify data per sample
  • Error Rates: Sequencing accuracy assessment

Advantages

  • Platform Agnostic: Works with multiple sequencers
  • Automated Validation: Sample sheet and output checks
  • Comprehensive QC: Multiple quality metrics
  • Reproducible: Containerized workflow
  • Well-Documented: Extensive usage guides

Input Requirements

  • Raw Sequencing Data: BCL files or platform-specific format
  • Sample Sheet: Index sequences and sample information
  • Run Parameters: Sequencing configuration details
  • Optional: Custom index sequences

Main Outputs

  • FASTQ Files: Demultiplexed sample-specific reads
  • Quality Reports: Falco and MultiQC summaries
  • Demux Statistics: Read counts per sample
  • Index Metrics: Demultiplexing quality scores
  • MD5 Checksums: File integrity validation
  • Undetermined Reads: Unassigned sequences
